https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gYkNoaAzZmg3PgjoHo7bF0MzHAh.jpg Treasure hunter Sean stumbles across a trove of priceless artifacts off the coast of a remote Caribbean island. To help him, he assembles a team of experts to authenticate his finds, only to discover one of the "experts" has a different agenda. 1313: Bermuda Triangle
